trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around August 4th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw 3 large orange circles next to a street light or farm house from airplane the rest of the area was dark. My family and I were coming back from vacation we were on flight from Texas to Kansas City Mo. The plane was not very full so after the plane was in the air, I move across the isle seat next to a collage girl from Texas she was visiting friends in KC .I heard the captain say prepare to decent I guess we were getting close to Kansas City. As i was talking to the girl I look out the window it was dark and I saw 3 large orange circles in a straight line they were next to a street light or farm house light just as I was going to tell the girl they disappear I didn't say anything. The way disappear you seem those lava light they kinda stretch out that how they disappear one by one.I don't know if it was a ufo.
Summary: I saw 3 large orange circles in a straight line touching together from an airplane.
